verses.roman:
āra dina bhaṭṭācārya āilā darśane
jagannātha nā dekhi' āilā prabhu-sthāne

synonyms: āra dina—the next day; bhaṭṭācārya—Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya; āilā—came; darśane—to see Lord Jagannātha; jagannātha—Lord Jagannātha; nā dekhi'-without seeing; āilā—came; prabhu-sthāne—to the place of Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu.
translation: The next day, the Bhaṭṭācārya went to visit the temple of Lord Jagannātha, but before he reached the temple, he went to see Caitanya Mahāprabhu.
